entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 27. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning then snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning. Wind chill minus 27 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 13 January 2023
